title: Why do you constantly try to balance URF?
body:
But you won't do anything about champions like Yi/Fizz/Kayn etc. being untargetable for 90% of the match? 

Just let us pick our freaking champions and keep heals/shields nerfed and add bans like in normal games and we're fine. Stop with this random crap because games end in 9 minutes once the enemy team gets one of those champions you literally can't touch because you can't physically target them with anything for the majority of the game

replies.body: Adding bans means nothing, because then folk are going to go complain about the next thing that annoys them after untargetibility. My bet's on CC.

Displacement.
At least for normal cc u can buy tenacity boots and 25% is apply by default.
You can't counter displacement tho.
I fucking wish ARAM got HALF the balance attention a shitty RGM what's going to vanish for most of the year did.

> [{quoted}](name=Packun Flower,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=b03X0URP,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2019-02-23T02:16:23.260+0000)
>
> I fucking wish ARAM got HALF the balance attention a shitty RGM what's going to vanish for most of the year did.

I have a few suggestions of things they could do to fix ARAM -

- All champions unlocked in ARAM.

 or

- Disable the OP's like Sona, Lux, Xerath, Ziggs, Fiddlesticks, Jayce

 or

- Give the OP ARAM champs ({{champion:9}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:126}} etc)  **heavy MAP SPECIFIC stats and damage based nerfs ** like they did for Sona in ARURF.  

 or

- Remove Clarity and Presence of Mind from ARAM - Notice how most of the top tier champions are Mages?  These 2 make mana irrelevant.


Sona and Ziggs in particular have been sitting in the high 60's - low 70's for ARAM winrates for years.


 


What's ruining ARAM is these "ARAM accounts" who only buy top tier champs like Sona, Lux, Xerath, Ziggs, Fiddlesticks, Jayce etc.

Most of the time they still get those champions anyway so recent change to add 3 weeks of free rotation didn't do much.


 

I also hope Nexus Blitz becomes permanent.

Nexus Blitz is 100x better than ARAM and you have control over your picks and bans.

agree with nexus blitz being amazing
i miss that mode
was like the twisted tree line from 6 years ago or so
whats the point of urf mode when it doesn't even take one round of abilities to kill someone. this game sucks

it's still a fun mode but most of all, it highlights problems even more

it was supposed to be a fun mode where champions fight without any real limitations, instead we now have masteries on roughly 6 second cooldowns and of course, items get the same crazy reductions

the original URF was great, but ARURF puts your chances of winning on RNG, much less chances of fun for the larger amount of champions you have

melee champions rarely do anything in urf and there are quite a few of them...

> melee champions rarely do anything in urf and there are quite a few of them...

Actually they are the sleeper OP in urf. Especially bruisers or fighters. You usually don't see it, as they require time and gold to work, but once ahead even tiny bit you get 30-frag monsters like irelia, fiora, yi. I know I just pointed out easiest 3, but there are few more of them.

Personally my "i should be careful not to feed" list goes like this assassins/divers/fighters/bruisers -> ADC -> mages. Ofc there are few exceptions, but overall mages are the most average in this mod actually

I just can't believe there are people who prefer AURF over Nexus Blitz.
They should either balance the problematic things or not at all. I would much rather see broken healing/cc than untargetable fizz cancer.

-5% damage nerf to {{champion:86}} when he spins more than 5 times every second.

Thanks Riot, that nerf really fixes him.
What the heck did they change?

I haven't seen any good kayn ever, but fizz, yi, heca, kha, lucian, vayne, mf, shaco, garen, riven... It's cancer in purest form when onetricks play them

That being said: I'd say:

1. reduce AS ranged/melee champions get 100/50 -> 50/25 (it adds to the base AS, so any further AS item you buy becomes alot more effective)

2. remove 25% bonus crit damage. It's just favourizing AD crit reliant class. Maybe add 25% crit chance instead

3. If champions are "overused" or far too good, then reduce their URF power untill they get toned down. I know it's kinda anti-URF, but I'd really love a game without hecarim, or fizz.

And add bans. 3 per team each for random player (no need 5 bans, cause it's kinda too much imo)

People complain about everything so Rito tries to "fix" it.

I mean URF is a joke mode and people try hard. Some things just need let go, but people can't.
The only way of making rigged urf balanced is adding 10 fucking bans and thats it...

{{champion:89}} {{champion:111}} are turbo cancer in URF.

Even if you take Legend: Tenacity and Mercury Treads.... Good luck trying to move,
But yeah don't do something about em or fizz because minus 8% damage on garen IS WAY MORE IMPORTANT
I feel like ARURF with bans would be the way to go. When you get into the game, have a quick ban phase, then randomly pick the champs from the non-banned.

It is an unbalanced mode that isn't truly fun except if you play the op champ or found a genuine funny strat while stomping people.
